attributes.action: Outlaw Sharia Law within the United Kingdom and outlaw all Imams discussing it
attributes.additional_details: Imams preaching about Sharia Law and mobs of Sharia Law screaming Muslims from harassing people going about their lawful business and all no go areas to be policed without PC. All Sharia Law supporters to be deported to Saudi Arabia who bankroll it.
attributes.background: Stop the hatred from spreading through the United Kingdom from supporters of Sharia Law.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/160883
